message:
Delighted to release a stamp on Sant Shri Ramanujacharya at a time when we mark his 1000th birth anniversary. 

Sant Shri Ramanujacharya was a millennial sage. His thoughts were always ahead of time & his concern towards the poor was very inspiring. At the core of Sant Shri Ramanujacharya’s message was the need for an inclusive society, religion and philosophy. 
http://nm-4.com/4ws4
